name: jellyfin
description: Jellyfin is a free, open source media server that organizes and streams movies, shows and music to many devices. It offers multi user libraries, live TV, hardware transcoding and a wide ecosystem of clients, all fully self hosted.
features: Media Streaming: Movies, TV shows, music, Live TV support. Complete media center.
Transcoding: Hardware acceleration, Multiple formats, Adaptive streaming. Play anywhere.
Multi-User: User profiles, Parental controls, Watch history. Family-friendly.
Clients: Web, mobile, TV apps, Desktop clients. Every platform covered.
Library Management: Automatic metadata, Artwork fetching, Organization tools. Beautiful libraries.
Live TV: DVR functionality, EPG support, Recording schedules. Cut the cord.
Plugins: Extend features, Community add-ons, Custom integrations. Endless customization.
Sync: Offline downloads, Mobile sync, Resume playback. Watch on the go.
No Fees: Completely free, No premium tiers, Open source. True freedom.
Privacy: Self-hosted, No tracking, Your data stays yours. Complete control.
